name: Tao Yeung
story: Feng Wong grew up in a small village in China, where he learned the value of discipline and hard work. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his leadership skills and tactical acumen. He was selected to lead a squad of soldiers in the OPFOR faction and now serves as their Squad Leader. Despite his stern demeanor, he cares deeply for his fellow soldiers and will stop at nothing to ensure their safety.
